publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4686 Elaine Smith: Trans-shipment of US Arms Through Scottish Airports—That the Parliament expresses alarm regarding the Israeli military assault on Lebanon; conveys particular concern at the Foreign Office’s weak response to the issue of the trans-shipment of US arms to Israel via Prestwick Airport; considers that the consignment of "bunker busting" bombs, which have already passed through Scotland, will likely be used against Lebanese targets, with the potential to injure innocent civilians; recognises findings which show that 61% of Britons do not support the nature of Israel’s actions in Lebanon; suggests that the Scottish Executive should liaise with Her Majesty’s Government to ensure the immediate cessation of such arms trans-shipments, and further requests that it expresses support for the demand for an immediate ceasefire as outlined by UN Secretary General, Kofi Annan. Supported by: Bill Butler*, Brian Adam*, Colin Fox*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Robin Harper*, Marlyn Glen*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Christine Grahame*, Chris Ballance*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Dave Petrie*, Rob Gibson*, Eleanor Scott*, Patrick Harvie*, Fiona Hyslop*, Cathy Peattie*
S2M-4686 Trans-shipment of US Arms Through Scottish Airports (lodged on 31 July 2006) Dennis Canavan*, Kate Maclean*, Pauline McNeill*
S2M-4686 Trans-shipment of US Arms Through Scottish Airports (lodged on 31 July 2006) Carolyn Leckie*
